The kingdom is deteriorating. People are beginning to act strange... What's even more strange is that people are beginning to see dragons, which shouldn't enter the world of humans. Due to all these bizarre events, Ged, a wandering wizard, is investigating the cause. During his journey, he meets Prince Arren, a young distraught teenage boy. While Arren may look like a shy young teen, he has a severe dark side, which grants him strength, hatred, ruthlessness and has no mercy, especially when it comes to protecting Teru. For the witch Kumo this is a perfect opportunity. She can use the boy's \"fears\" against the very one who would help him, Ged.","poster_path":"/y0VnJt4eRPMjA1hpJ8f1EFoVaSf.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16,14,12],"popularity":35.387,"release_date":"2006-07-29","video":false,"vote_average":6.5,"vote_count":1274},{"backdrop_path":"/yVDvtPaouact2AFFTC4stQ8koq5.jpg","id":37797,"title":"Whisper of the Heart","original_title":"耳をすませば","overview":"Shizuku lives a simple life, dominated by her love for stories and writing. Natsuki Enomoto has finally mustered the courage to confess to her childhood friend, Yuu Setoguchi. However, in the final moments of her confession, an embarrassed Natsuki passes it off as a \"practice confession.\" Oblivious to her true feelings and struggling with his own, Yuu promises to support Natsuki in her quest for love. While Natsuki deals with her failed confession, fellow classmate Koyuki Ayase struggles with his own feelings for Natsuki. Despite his timidness, he is determined to win over her heart.  This movie follows Natsuki as she dreams of one day ending her practices and genuinely confessing to Yuu. Meanwhile, close friends also find themselves entangled in their own webs of unrequited love and unspoken affections.","poster_path":"/rQDnIuWMYdZ2BXwaqy4Ird4w8Kw.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16,18,10749],"popularity":16.424,"release_date":"2016-04-23","video":false,"vote_average":7.482,"vote_count":141},{"backdrop_path":"/geb9rshjxNqeLQAc8CS8VRzFDlF.jpg","id":14069,"title":"The Girl Who Leapt Through Time","original_title":"時をかける少女","overview":"When 17-year-old Makoto Konno gains the ability to, quite literally, \"leap\" backwards through time, she immediately sets about improving her grades and preventing personal mishaps. Ashitaka must find a way to bring balance to this conflict.","poster_path":"/cMYCDADoLKLbB83g4WnJegaZimC.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[12,14,16],"popularity":95.763,"release_date":"1997-07-12","video":false,"vote_average":8.338,"vote_count":7780},{"backdrop_path":"/r3ibKnJ3qZvcm42OleT0HlcRDUk.jpg","id":79707,"title":"Children Who Chase Lost Voices","original_title":"星を追う子ども","overview":"The film centers on Asuna, a young girl who spends her solitary days listening to the mysterious music emanating from the crystal radio she received from her late father as a memento.
